articles.title: Morning Bid: Nvidia shares take bumpy ride after hours - Reuters

A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Wayne Cole.
The early focus was on Nvidia (NVDA.O), which in AI tech terms is the only company selling shovels during a gold rush. Its Q3 … [+2922 chars]
